description.en: Kripto Galaxy Battle is an Idle NFT game built on KardiaChain which aims to create a mass-adoption and Play-to-earn ecosystem. It is a strategy game set in a future universe, where participants will explore the galaxy searching for rare gems. Users will have enjoyable gaming experiences and gain profits by completing in-game quests, collecting NFT items, and selling them on Marketplace. The game is the collaboration between a fully-experienced game studio Cyforce and a Defi Platform — BecoSwap.
